title: Prepare a Witness for Deposition
description: An attorney needs to prepare a key witness for an upcoming deposition.

tasks.description: Review all documents authored or received by the witness that have been produced in the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all relevant documents for the witness prep session.

tasks.description: Draft an outline of likely topics and questions the opposing counsel will ask.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed preparation outline.

tasks.description: Create a binder (physical or electronic) for the witness containing the key documents and the preparation outline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assembles a complete witness prep binder.
